H0.text: Of what family are Onion, garlic, shallot, leek and chive. Alliaceae

H1.text: Of what family are Onion, garlic, shallot, leek and chive. Liliaceae

H2.text: Of what family are Onion, garlic, shallot, leek and chive. Amaryllidaceae

H3.text: Of what family are Onion, garlic, shallot, leek and chive. Cepa

A4.text: Alliaceae to include all of the genera that are now included in Allioideae

A5.text: Alliaceae were variously treated as either Liliaceae, Amaryllidaceae, or Alliaceae

A6.text: Alliaceae in Stevens, P. F. (2001 onwards). Angiosperm Phylogeny Website.
